title: Chao Mini Zhanshi
synopsis: Can't get up? Can't remember reading? You have been invaded by troublesome stars! According to the tracking study of the most powerful brain girl in the universe, it turns out that human beings are not all inborn. It may be created by the troublesome star people of negative energy bodies! To defeat negative energy, one must rely on positive energy. So Doctor Girl created super mini fighters-Mini Brave and Mini Moe with courage and happiness as elements! They defeated the nasty troublesome stars with their super mini size and let people live a happy life again~ Do you also have countless troubles? Call the Super Mini Warrior! ! ! (translated from qq)
